shiloh
Radix lecti

Registered: Oct 2001
Location: City of Angels
Posts: 1953

I have to (unhappily) fall into the camp of feeling a SG film would not do well, unless they went back to Kurt Russell & James Spader.

Ugly truth is, most people have not seen the series, or lump it together with stuff like Andromeda and wouldn't want to see a big-screen film based on it. It does ok in the ratings but not great.

Trek is unique in being a series that made a good movie. I can no more imagine people plunking down $10 for a SG1 movie than I can see them paying $10 to see a movie based on CSI or West Wing or even Farscape. Personally, I'd rather see a decent budget TV movie, and it makes me unhappy that TPTB have rejected that idea.
